name: composite

metadata.description:
composite Sensor


Composite sensor, it will send as many actions as there are objects in the propertyList.

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed
Raw Data
  • response (only returns on Success state)
  • errorMessage (only returned on Error state)

Properties
  • sensor: The actuator you want to execute.
  • propertyList: list of objects containing the properties that are needed to execute the sensor

Example propertyList = 
[{ 
 "from": "info@waylay.io",
 "to" : "hello@world",
 "message" : "hi",
 "subject" : "test1", 
 "MANDRILL_KEY": "${vault.MANDRILL_KEY}"
  },
  { 
 "from": "info@waylay.io",
 "to" : "hello@world",
 "message" : "hello",
 "subject" : "test2", 
 "MANDRILL_KEY": "${vault.MANDRILL_KEY}"
  }]
sensor= mandrilMail
